name: cloud-event-signup-system
description: Full-stack event management system for ministry events

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
